messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, As a nurse I could never be a member of a party who wanted to privatise the NHS. UKIP will keep the NHS free at the point of delivery and commit to putting in another 3 billion pounds.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP will keep the NHS free at the point of delivery and commit to putting in another 3 billion pounds.
UKIP are the only party talking about immigration, more people are now discussing openly issues caused by open borders over which we have no control.
Democracy demands the British people have the choice to decide if they wish to remain in the E.U. or not.

mentions.candidate: As a nurse I could never be a member of a party who wanted to privatise the NHS.
